content: the easiest triangle stockinette version by justine malone you can make this scarf or shawl any size with any gauge of yarn you will be creating a triangle by starting with only 3 stitches which is the bottom point of the scarf simply knit until it s the size you desire yarn needles neck scarf 50 grams use the needle size appropriate for your tiny shawl 100 grams yarn proper shawl 300 grams big old wrap 500+ grams pattern set up 1 cast on 3 stitches 2 rs kfb knit1 s1wyif 4 sts 3 ws kfb p2 sl1wyif 5 sts 4 kfb k3 s1wyif 6 sts castawayyarnshop com 100fourthstreet entranceonwilson 707 546 yarn santarosa ca95401 the pattern abbreviations 5 ws kfb k1 p until 3 st remain k2 s1wyif k / knit 6 rs kfb k until 1 st remains sl1wyif 7 repeat row 5 & 6 until desired size kfb / knit the stitch into the front then leaving enough yarn for bind off 4 times into the back before dropping off the width of bind off edge 8 bind off all sts in pattern p / purl rs / right side st / stitch es st s / stitch es ws / wrong side s1wyif / with yarn in front
